title: CS Competency Practical Skill Enhancement: Social Knowledge Construction Through Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design knowledge-building processes for solving social issues using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can collaboratively complete analytical reports on social issues through peer feedback exchanges.
Learners can derive integrated conclusions incorporating diverse perspectives by applying structured scaffolding in online discussion platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
